name: Keep Them Sick !
description:
# Keep Dem' Sick !

## " A healed patient, a lost client.
## A dead patient, a lost client."

Description : You have to keep the patient in the hospital by giving the good pill.
To win, you have to reach 100$.
Half life, you win more money!

Keys ZQSD : Move.
E : interact.

We made this from scratch.
First Ludum Dare for "La Poulperie" .*

Level Design / Graphism = Skyalogia | 

Programming = Vuvuzuella

Music by Aurelien Montero "Punkzen".
